thread.title: Swedish Politician Resigns After Calling for Trump Assassination
thread.title_full: Swedish Politician Resigns After Calling for Trump Assassination

author: V Saxena
title: Swedish Politician Resigns After Calling for Trump Assassination
text:
George Soros Tied to Campaign to Impeach President Trump 
Peterson removed the post from his Facebook page an hour later, though by then the damage had already been done. 
“It is good that he removed it,” fellow council member Johan Persson reportedly told Swedish news outlet Oestra Smalan, though he added that a “call for violence” should “never” have been issued in the first place. 
The backlash eventually spurred the disgraced politician into officially resigning. Advertisement - story continues below 
“After my blunder on Facebook, there is a risk that I will become a burden for the Social Democrats in Kalmar,” he reportedly wrote in a letter to his peers. “I do not want it, so I chose to leave all my posts.” 
Good riddance. 
According to the U.K. Independent , what had driven Peterson to make such a foolhardy “blunder” was the U.S. president’s open-minded stance on man-made climate change, the reality of which he has often questioned. 
Apparently, questioning an unproven theory’s validity is enough these days to warrant having a leftist politician ask others to shoot you. Advertisement - story continues below
